pageProduct.name: Nutra-Life Glucosamine Chondroitin Msm Joint Food 300g Powder
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scientifically formulated, this joint powder combines MSM with Glucosamine sulfate and Chondroitin sulfate. Chondroitin sulfate has been shown to support joint health.

Suitable For: Joint Health, joint mobility, cartilage support

Size: 300g oral powder

Flavour: unflavoured

KEY FEATURES

• Mild Osteoarthritis Symptom Relief
• Contains Chondroitin sulfate to support joint health

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your healthcare professional. DERIVED FROM SEAFOOD. Contains 257mg of Potassium per
4g serve. If you have kidney disease or are taking heart or blood pressure medicines, consult your doctor or pharmacist before use.

Ingredients

Serving size 4g (1 level scoop).
Serves per day: 2 level scoops (8g). Servings per pack = 75.
Per 4g Per 8g (daily dose)
Bovine chondroitin sulfate 600mg 1.2g
Dimethyl sulfone (MSM) 875mg 1.75g
Glucosamine sulfate potassium chloride 1.99g 3.98 g
Equiv. Glucosamine sulfate 1.5g 3.0g
Equiv. Potassium chloride 490mg 980mg
Cofactors
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 300mg 600mg
Boron (as Borax) 2mg 4mg
Copper (as gluconate) 1mg 2mg
Manganese (as sulfate monohydrate) 6mg 12mg
Zinc (as oxide) 12mg 24mg

Contains: Contains: Animal product, crustacean products, potassium salts.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives| Dairy| Egg| Gluten| Soy| Wheat

Directions

RECOMMENDED ADULT DOSAGE: Add 1 level scoop (4g) to 250mL water or fruit juice. Mix thoroughly prior to consumption and take with meals twice daily. Alternatively 1 level scoop (4g) can be added to food twice daily. Or as directed by your healthcare professional.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Shake well before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place below 30°C.
